meanings.definition: Having many bumps or uneven surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The bumpiest road made the car shake.
meanings.sent2: The hiking trail was the bumpiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The bumpiest ride at the amusement park was both thrilling and scary.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting on the bumpy paper was the bumpiest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The bumpiest roller coaster in the park left everyone screaming with excitement.

meanings.definition: Experiencing a lot of bumps or jolts.
meanings.sent1: The bumpiest bus ride made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: The bumpiest flight I ever had was during a storm.
meanings.sent3: Trying to dance on the bumpiest dance floor was a hilarious challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her journey through life had been the bumpiest yet most rewarding.
meanings.sent5: The bumpiest boat ride on the lake left everyone soaked and laughing.
